content.text: Match ends, Birmingham City 0, Chelsea 2.
Second Half ends, Birmingham City 0, Chelsea 2.
David Luiz (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Marlon King (Birmingham City).
Substitution, Chelsea. Michael Essien replaces Juan Mata.
Corner,  Birmingham City. Conceded by David Luiz.
Attempt saved. Marlon King (Birmingham City) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top centre of the goal.
Offside, Birmingham City. Jonathan Spector tries a through ball, but Nikola Zigic is caught offside.
Corner,  Birmingham City. Conceded by Gary Cahill.
Foul by Raul Meireles (Chelsea).
Nathan Redmond (Birmingham City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Corner,  Birmingham City. Conceded by John Obi Mikel.
Corner,  Birmingham City. Conceded by David Luiz.
Attempt missed. Jordon Mutch (Birmingham City) left footed shot from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Chris Burke with a through ball.
Dangerous play by Marlon King (Birmingham City).
David Luiz (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Corner,  Birmingham City. Conceded by Petr Cech.
Foul by Gary Cahill (Chelsea).
Jordon Mutch (Birmingham City) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Substitution, Chelsea. Frank Lampard replaces Ramires.
Attempt missed. Nathan Redmond (Birmingham City) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the left following a corner.
Corner,  Birmingham City. Conceded by Ryan Bertrand.
Offside, Chelsea. Branislav Ivanovic tries a through ball, but Fernando Torres is caught offside.
Substitution, Birmingham City. Marlon King replaces Guirane N'Daw.
Penalty saved! Juan Mata (Chelsea) fails to capitalise on this great opportunity,  left footed shot saved  in the bottom right corner.
Penalty Chelsea. Fernando Torres draws a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty conceded by Guirane N'Daw (Birmingham City) after a foul in the penalty area.
Attempt saved. Daniel Sturridge (Chelsea) left footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom left corner.
Attempt missed. Branislav Ivanovic (Chelsea) header from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Juan Mata with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Nikola Zigic.
Ramires (Chelsea) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Guirane N'Daw (Birmingham City).

Goal!  Birmingham City 0, Chelsea 2. Raul Meireles (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box to the top right corner. Assisted by Ramires.

Substitution, Chelsea. Daniel Sturridge replaces Salomon Kalou.
Juan Mata (Chelsea) wins a free kick on the left wing.

Goal!  Birmingham City 0, Chelsea 1. Juan Mata (Chelsea) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner.
